scripts.constants:testnet: npm run codegen && mustache config/constants/testnet.json config/constants/template.hbs > generated/constants.ts
scripts.constants:mainnet: npm run codegen && mustache config/constants/mainnet.json config/constants/template.hbs > generated/constants.ts
scripts.build:testnet: npm run constants:testnet && graph build --network-file config/networks/testnet.json --network mainnet
scripts.build:mainnet: npm run constants:mainnet && graph build --network-file config/networks/mainnet.json --network mainnet
